lines.text: Prepare the Sales space: Sia Bot, Contract Assistant, Karen, Gordon, Rishi, Patrick
https://workspace.ibm.com/enableApp?shareToken=b20598aa-4963-4289-bf93-771b3d90b73b
I really think that if we can get this deal done we'll be in great shape for next quarter
Agreed *Karen*. Their market share is growing like wildfire. I just hope we can move quickly enough
Yep - exciting stuff. What has been the difference maker for you Gordon in terms of deals with cloud providers in the past?
It's tough because they're all so different... but what I will say is that they love having a partner with connections in other tech spaces. Which is why I feel optimistic of our chances.
I think Maya is going to chime in soon, I know she has a close relationship with the client
Greenwell Deal ‚òÅÔ∏è
I'm going to add the rest of the team
Hey - Mimmi from Greenwell here
Hi everyone, Tim from legal here as well
Great - thanks for creating the space. <@fe5421eb-56ff-4a8f-a309-9be1af22e030|Maya> - do you have the latest version of the contract with Greenwell?
Here it is!
Looks great to me!
Hey everyone. What's the latest on Greenwell?
Thanks for sharing these insights, Maya. Who has the bandwidth to update the pitch deck with this info?
Awesome, glad to hear it. Tim - thanks for putting this together for us.
Not a problem. My pleasure!
By the way, Tim, I heard through the grapevine you were moving this month. Hows that going?!
I'm heads down on another project, but I know <@17bf3c7f-45c9-4646-a3b8-fb457e63c206|Patrick> was working on the deck.
Really excited - we actually close on everything this Friday!
Oh that reminds me Maya, we need your signature on this Greenwell contract by the end of the day.
Yes! I can update by EOD.
Right. Back to business.
Once we have that signature I think we're ready to go.
*Maya Davis* has signed the [Greenwell Contract](https://ibm.box.com/s/3tnuc3c7r7qve5mmq1yrfs7jbk76z6hj)
The deal just went through. Great job everyone üéâ. Now what's next?
